articles.title: Is SARS-CoV-2 a seasonal virus? - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: In a recent study posted to the medRxiv* pre-print server, scientists at Pfizer Inc determined whether coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) case rates in the United States (US) and European (EU) nations followed a seasonal pattern using a time series model.

articles.title: ASX rises at open as it bids to end losing streak - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The ASX 200 has risen in morning trade, putting it on track to snap a seven-day losing streak after stronger European shares took centre stage with Wall Street closed for a holiday.

articles.title: Europe may need to return to coal as Russia reduces gas flows - CBC News
articles.description: Europe's biggest buyers of Russian gas raced to find alternative fuel supplies on Monday and could burn more coal to cope with reduced gas flows from Russia that threaten an energy crisis in winter if stores are not refilled.
